name: Metronome Dungeon
description:
Play as Albert the Hero as you enter and explore the fabled Metronome Dungeon in search of the legendary treasure it hides. Be warned, the dungeon is very dangerous and contains many monsters that will try and stop you on your quest. If you can fight the monsters, climb the stairs, avoid the traps, and find the legendary Metronome of destiny you may be able to make it.

How to Play: 

Exploring:

Each level of the dungeon is randomly generated with different layouts and treasures on each one. Every level will have walls that give the level an interesting layout. You may notice some wills with cracks in them, they are breakable and can be destroyed with just a touch. Their may also be spikes on the ground, teaching them will destroy them but also hurt you. The stairs will always be in the 

In the dungeon you can find many treasures that can help you on your journey.  Helmets , Armor, and Shields will increase how your health. Meats will increase you attacks maximum damage while Drinks and increase you attacks minimum damage. Rings will add extra damage to you attacks.

You might also find bombs while exploring. If you have bombs you can press the 0 space bar near a wall allowing you to access blocked off areas or near traps to destroy them and traverse safely.

Attack: 

When you climb the stairs you will be greeted by a monster. In order to fight it you must press the space bar in time with the attack bar to do damage. The closer you are to the middle the more powerful your attack will be. If you hit the middle you will do a powerful critical attack for double your regular damage. 

To win: 

Eventually, after all your exploring and fighting and getting to a high enough level, the Metronome will appear somewhere in the dungeon. All you have to do is find it and take it with you to the stairs and your quest will be complete.

(This is my first click team game. I made it in under a month and had a really fun time making it.  Sorry that it is short but I hope you enjoy it. Watch out for more games in the future.)
